scripts.build: yarn run copyprotos ${YARNFLAGS} && yarn run buildnative ${YARNFLAGS} && tsc && yarn run binplace ${YARNFLAGS} && yarn run lint ${YARNFLAGS}
scripts.binplacetestdata: mkdir -p bin/tests/runtime/langhost/cases/ && find tests/runtime/langhost/cases/* -type d -exec cp -R {} bin/tests/runtime/langhost/cases/ \;
scripts.binplace: yarn run binplaceprotos ${YARNFLAGS} && yarn run binplacenative ${YARNFLAGS} && yarn run binplacetestdata ${YARNFLAGS}
scripts.test: yarn run cov ${YARNFLAGS} && yarn run covreport ${YARNFLAGS}
scripts.covreport: istanbul report text-summary && istanbul report text
